A chain letter's a chain letter, no matter what the disguise.  Gimli 
doesn't post here anyway, so why not just ban him?

That's one of the dumbest cover stories I've ever heard.  Even Bill 
Gates doesn't have that kind of money to throw away.  (Although he's 
very close.)
